eu.monnetproject.mrd

Interface LexicalRelation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TranslationRelation

    public interface LexicalRelation
    A lexical relation, such as hypernym, antonym etc.
    Author:
    John McCrae

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static LexicalRelation ANOTNYM
      Antonymy.
      static LexicalRelation HOLONYM
      Holonymy.
      static LexicalRelation HYPERNYM
      Hypernymy.
      static LexicalRelation HYPONYM
      Hyponymy.
      static LexicalRelation MERONYM
      Mernonymy.
      static LexicalRelation SYNONYM
      Synonymy.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Get the name of this relation

    • Field Detail

      • HYPERNYM

        static final LexicalRelation HYPERNYM
        Hypernymy. X is a hypernym of Y, if X is more generic than Y

      • HYPONYM

        static final LexicalRelation HYPONYM
        Hyponymy. X is a hyponym of Y, if X is more specific than Y

      • SYNONYM

        static final LexicalRelation SYNONYM
        Synonymy. X and Y are synonyms, if they have the same meaning

      • MERONYM

        static final LexicalRelation MERONYM
        Mernonymy. X is a meronym of Y, if X is a part of Y

      • HOLONYM

        static final LexicalRelation HOLONYM
        Holonymy. X is a holonym of Y, if X (partly) consists of Y

      • ANOTNYM

        static final LexicalRelation ANOTNYM
        Antonymy. X is an anotnym of Y, if X and Y have opposite meanings

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the name of this relation
